cards.name: Sedans
cards.description: Choose a sedan for its affordability and excellent fuel economy. Ideal for cruising in the city or on your next road trip.

cards.name: SUVs
cards.description: Take an SUV for its spacious interior, power, and versatility. Perfect for your next family vacation and off-road adventures.

cards.name: Luxury
cards.description: Cruise in the best car brands without the bloated prices. Enjoy the enhanced comfort of a luxury rental and arrive in style.
